Monica Moran

  1. Foster Name: Monica May
  2. Foster Family: Joseph and Agnes Glaser Weber
  3. Location of Family: Spalding, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-02-28, Staten Island, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1981-07-02, Hastings, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Monica B. Kaiser
  11. Spouse Name: Otto Kaiser
  12. Source: OTR, 14; 1920 United States Federal Census; Find-a-Grave; Cora Esch, Early Days of Spalding; "St. Michael's Parish, 1886-1986"; Spalding Enterprise, 23 July 1981; Spalding Enterprise, 16 May 1912; Grand Island Independent, 12 May 1912; National Orphan Train Complex; Social Security Death Index.
